name: built.io
description: built.io is a mobile backend and application development platform. By powering the entire backend (servers, cloud infrastructure, database, scaling), and delivering built-in core app functionality, built.io lets developers build apps in record time, and focus their talent on an awesome user experience. Built from the ground up to support the growing enterprise mobility market, built.io is first to release business user tools, a unique feature set among mobile application development platforms.
